game.name: Kick the Buddy
game.description:
Hey friends! What could be better than diving into a fun-filled environment that is full of action-packed challenges? We have got covered you covered with a brand new action game where you have to freeze, shoot, fire, destroy, explore and expert God. Does not it sound pretty exciting and challenging? Join Kick the Buddy and be prepared to play with different kinds of weapons and show off the world that you are a true fighter!

Destroy your enemies with the help of tanks, flame throwers, laser guns, rocket launchers, submachine guns and flying knives in this one of the best HTML5 shooting games! It is time to release your anger and challenge your shooting skills like never before. Your help will work as a hand of God since the puppets cannot move their hands. There is no need to bother in case if you get tired as you would also have the weapon to use. Let your weapon shoot your enemies automatically!

A limitless arsenal including a nuclear bomb, automatic rifles, grenades, and rockets will be there to use. Slap the doll and forget about your anger in this highly relaxing and top interactive action game! It is up to you what you want to do, bash and ragdoll or beat the boss. We know that you are going to have a lot of fun in this destroying game. Good luck to chill out and behave like a relatively stress-free person! Play such more interesting and challenging free action shooters and have fun without download!
